entry.title: 零散的英语学习笔记
entry.content:
#记录平时遇到的特殊的短语搭配和句子…

1.I think it was a mutual conversation.我觉得那是一场彼此尊重/双方参与的谈话
2.描述某种意义上努力的成果：
1.It’s kind of the fruit of our labor.
2.It’s sort of a result of the hard work we put in.
3.It’s a kind of reward for all the work.
3.I think I’m gonna try being more straight edge for a while.我要尝试一段时间更自律一点
straight edge:引申为更克制，更健康的生活方式，不吸烟，不喝酒..
4.I find it tricky to say no without hurting people’s feelings.我觉得拒绝别人又不伤人感情挺难的
tricky指有点难，有点挑战，棘手的..
5.a natural place for spontaneity 一个适合自然流露/即兴发挥的地方
1.The studio became a natural place for spontaneity and creative flow工作室成了一个自然流露灵感与创意的地方
2.Our friendship has always been a natural place for spontaneity.我们的友谊一直都很自在，比较随心所欲
3.That living room was a natural place for spontaneity-laughter,music and dancing just happend.那个客厅就是个适合即兴发挥的地方-笑声，音乐，舞蹈都自然发生

..to be continue..
